title: Семья
overview: Yulia and Timofey are happily married and raising two daughters, trying to find a balance between personal affairs and family responsibilities. Vadim and Olya are just getting ready to become parents, and Vadim approaches the matter much more seriously than his wife. Pasha is still studying at the university and does not know what he wants to do. And a couple of parents raised their children, waited for grandchildren and now lives for themselves in a good way. Life consists of ordinary situations.
